name: CertiFit App
desc: An Android app for rating fitness supplements based on brand reputation, certifications, and ingredient transparency. Built with a clean UI and Kotlin, leveraging LiveData and RecyclerView.

name: Node.js RESTful API
desc: A backend project showcasing CRUD operations using Node.js and MongoDB Atlas. Designed for robust API development with a focus on RESTful principles.

name: News API App
desc: An Android app that fetches and displays the latest news using a RecyclerView in a fragment. Built using Kotlin and demonstrates seamless API integration.
